text: Deno M Davie (born 1965), is a male retired cyclist who competed for England. ==Cycling career== He represented England and competed in the road race and won a gold medal in the road team time trial with Alan Gornall, Keith Reynolds and Paul Curran, at the 1986 Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh, Scotland. He won one National Championship and was a professional from 1988-1989. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:English male cyclists Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in cycling Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists for England Category:Cyclists at the 1986 Commonwealth Games Category:Living people
title: Deno Davie
